benchmark_details.name: PATENT DESC-355K
benchmark_details.overview: We introduce PATENT DESC-355K, a novel large-scale dataset containing âˆ¼355K patent figures along with their brief and detailed textual descriptions extracted from 60K+ US patent documents.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To automate the understanding of patent figures, enabling efficient knowledge sharing and faster drafting of patent documents.

data.source: Curated from over 60K US patent documents and their corresponding descriptions.
data.annotation: Descriptions extracted from HTML documents of patents.

methodology.calculation: Based on standard image captioning metrics comparing generated and ground-truth descriptions.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better match to human-generated descriptions.
methodology.baseline_results: Outperforms existing models by significant margins.
methodology.validation: Cross-validated across training, validation, and test sets.
